description.narrative: This activity (Pakistan Education Task Force) is a component of Pakistan Education Task Force reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,312,447. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: British Council, Institute of Social and Policy Sciences, McKinsey & Company, River Path Associates. The start date is 01-12-2009 and the end date is 31-03-2014.

participating-org.narrative: Institute of Social and Policy Sciences

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
